i18n.value: Mangagung property management used to manage a property in the municipality.
The property registration form can't be edited once the completion process has been initiated.
Capture the details of the property.
Please select a valid date i.e. the date on which the site visit was undertaken.
Please select a due date i.e. the actual date that the data needs to be captured and authorised by.

steps._setStatusMsgTo: Form created
User assigned and data capture in progress

i18n.value: All form indicators have to be marked as complete before submission.

steps._setStatusMsgTo: Form data submitted, user assigned and form data under review

i18n.value: You have to be an authoriser on the project to approve the form data that has been captured or refer back for further editing.

steps._setStatusMsgTo: Form locked
